thread.title: The Jumanji remake is getting rewritten by the guys behind Gone in 60 Seconds and Lost - Movies
thread.title_full: The Jumanji remake is getting rewritten by the guys behind Gone in 60 Seconds and Lost - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Rachel Babbage
title: The Jumanji remake is getting rewritten by the guys behind Gone in 60 Seconds and Lost - Movies
text: The Jumanji remake is getting rewritten - but it's still on track to land next Christmas. Deadline reports that Scott Rosenberg (Con Air and Gone in 60 Seconds) has been hired by Columbia PIctures to rework what has already been developed for producers Matt Tolmach and Bill Teitler. Â© Getty Images / TriStarRobin Williams in the original Jumanji The film will apparently be a new version of Chris Van Allsburg's 1985 book about the board game that comes to life and wreaks havoc on the players' lives.Rosenberg's co-writer on the TV series Zoo, Jeff Pinkner (Alias, Lost and Fringe), is also understood to be working alongside him in a consulting capacity.The original Jumanji was released in 1995 and directed by Joe Johnston.Robin Williams starred as Alan Parrish, the grown-up version of a young boy sucked into the board game, before returning 26 years later. Kirsten Dunst and Bonnie Hunt co-starred.Jumanji's remake is due for release December 25, 2016.
